data.message: REALLY WISH FACEBOOK COULD HAVE IT TO WHERE WHEN I GET ON THERE SITE, I CAN SEE THE PICTURES OF THE PEOPLE IN THE CHAT AREA, AND TO WHERE I DONT HAVE TO GO ALL THE WAY THREW PEOPLES PHOTO'S TO PUT THE FACE WITH THE NAME.. SO IF YOU COULD PLEASE FIX THE PROBLEM.. I WOULD LIKE TO SEE PROFILE PICTURES, I HAVE HAD THIS PROBLE FOR ABOUT 1 MONTH, AND HAVE WAITED PATIENTLY FOR IT TO BE FIXED, AND NOW I AM GETTING A LITTLE ANNOYED WITH IT.. SO PLEASE.. PLEASE FIX IT.. THANK YOU SO MUCH~ AND HAVE A GREAT DAY!! LOL  ;)
